what: Axe, IBM, WAVE, and 10 custom tests

acts.what: used for tests on which chromium fails on some URLs
conduct and report an Axe test

items.description: Ensures role attribute has an appropriate value for the element

must pass any of.description: ARIA role banner is not allowed for given element
ARIA role banner is not allowed for given element

items.description: Ensures the contrast between foreground and background colors meets WCAG 2 AA contrast ratio thresholds

must pass any of.description: Element has insufficient color contrast of 2.16 (foreground color: #ff936e, background color: #ffffff, font size: 13.5pt (18px), font weight: bold). Expected contrast ratio of 4.5:1
Element has insufficient color contrast of 2.28 (foreground color: #ffffff, background color: #20c19e, font size: 9.8pt (13px), font weight: normal). Expected contrast ratio of 4.5:1
Element has insufficient color contrast of 2.28 (foreground color: #ffffff, background color: #20c19e, font size: 9.8pt (13px), font weight: normal). Expected contrast ratio of 4.5:1

items.description: Ensures elements have alternate text or a role of none or presentation
